poem:
Title: "In Salem's Shadow"

Streets aglow, Salem's night,
Rumours tangle in child's play.
Footprints echo fear and fright,
powdered whispers of grey.
Betty Parris and Abigail bend,
cocked ears to the spectral fray.
A year yet for hearts to mend,
or in spectral trials fray.
